meanings.definition: Divided into two parts or branches
meanings.sent1: The forficate tree had two distinct branches.
meanings.sent2: The forficate road split into two separate paths.
meanings.sent3: The forficate cake had two layers, making it easy to share.
meanings.sent4: Her forficate decision led to two different outcomes.
meanings.sent5: The forficate river flowed in two directions, creating a unique sight.

meanings.sent1: The forficate scissors had sharp, divided ends.
meanings.sent2: The forficate antenna on the insect helped it detect signals from afar.
meanings.sent3: The forficate wire got tangled due to its split ends.
meanings.sent4: Her forficate hairpin held her hair in place with its divided ends.
meanings.sent5: The forficate branches of the tree reached out in different directions, like fingers.
